title: TST Giveaway car; Zack's DBX Take; Why Urus Performante?; Q&A
description:
It's been a busy week! Zack gives us his take on the Aston Martin DBX; we reveal our new project car (that you could win), and we discuss why the Urus Performante even exists.
 

Then we answer questions about mods that make your car special, tracking a convertible vs buying a new car, the best used AWD sedan for $40k, and more!

Recorded September 15, 2022

 

FIND BERRYMAN AT ALL MAJOR AUTOMOTIVE RETAILERS. FOR MORE INFORMATION, GO TO BERRYMANPRODUCTS.COM.

Listen to FAST & LOOSE: F1 on Amazon Music or wherever you get your podcasts or listen ad-free by subscribing to Wondery Plus in the Wondery App.

Use Off The Record! and ALWAYS fight your tickets! Enter code TST10 for a 10% discount on your first case on the Off The Record app, or go to http://www.offtherecord.com/TST.

Want your question answered? Want to watch the live stream, get ad-free podcasts, or exclusive podcasts? Join our Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/thesmokingtirepodcast


 

Tweet at us!

https://www.Twitter.com/thesmokingtire

https://www.Twitter.com/zackklapman


 

Instagram:

author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
